name: Future Back Beta
description:
We are a small game team and hardly ever find time to work. our plan for this game to release on mobile. We are working on new maps and new weapons right now. If you have any suggestions feel free to contact with us. We also need a shop system to finish the project so do not think about this is the final product. There may be major bugs we are trying our best to fix them. 

Installation

Open the .rar file and drag the folders to your desktop. That is all. just run the .exe file now and enjoy.
